name: Setup Developer Tool 2018
description: SDT2018 steps the user through the major areas of race car setup creation and tuning, asking simple questions about the behavior of the car and the userâ€™s feel. Choosing from a menu of possible responses to the questions, the program calculates possible setup changes as it steps you through the setup creation process.
